name: Research Funding & Security
description: Impacts on federal research grants, funding priorities, and research security requirements for private R1 institutions

name: Advanced Research Programs
description: Impacts on specialized research initiatives, national laboratories, and high-priority research areas for leading private research universities

name: International Collaboration
description: Impacts on international research partnerships, scholar mobility, and global academic initiatives for private R1 institutions

name: Endowment Management
description: Impacts on endowment investment policies, reporting requirements, and financial regulations affecting well-endowed private institutions

name: Graduate Education
description: Impacts on graduate and professional education programs, including funding mechanisms and program requirements at private R1s

name: Public-Private Partnerships
description: Changes affecting academic-industry collaborations, tech transfer, and economic development initiatives for private research universities

name: Administrative Compliance
description: Compliance requirements, reporting mandates, and regulatory changes specifically affecting private R1 institutions
